    • Method Detail

      • buildMarketData

        public MarketEnvironmentResult buildMarketData(MarketDataRequirements requirements,
                                               MarketEnvironment suppliedData,
                                               MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig,
                                               boolean includeIntermediateValues)
        Description copied from interface: MarketDataFactory
        Builds a set of market data.

        If the requirements specify any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine.

        A market environment contains the basic market data values that are of interest to users. For example, a market environment might contain market quotes, calibrated curves and volatility surfaces.

        It is anticipated that MarketEnvironment will be exposed directly to users.

        The market data used in calculations is provided by CalculationMarketDataMap. This contains the same data as MarketEnvironment plus additional derived values used by the calculations and scenario framework.

        CalculationMarketDataMap can be built from a MarketEnvironment using MarketDataFactory.buildCalculationMarketData(com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata.CalculationRequirements, com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata.MarketEnvironment, com.opengamma.strata.calc.marketdata.config.MarketDataConfig)

        Specified by:
        buildMarketData in interface MarketDataFactory
        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required
        suppliedData - the market data supplied by the caller
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        includeIntermediateValues - if this flag is true all market data values are returned including intermediate values used to build other values. If it is false the returned data will only include the values specified in tne requirements. This is intended to be used when debugging problems building market data
        Returns:
        the requested market data plus details of any data that could not be built

      • buildCalculationMarketData

        public CalculationMarketDataMap buildCalculationMarketData(CalculationRequirements requirements,
                                                           MarketEnvironment suppliedData,
                                                           MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig)
        Description copied from interface: MarketDataFactory
        Builds the market data required for performing calculations over a portfolio.

        If the calculations require any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine.

        CalculationMarketDataMap contains the same data as MarketEnvironment plus additional derived values used by the calculations and scenario framework.

        Specified by:
        buildCalculationMarketData in interface MarketDataFactory
        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required for the calculations
        suppliedData - market data supplied by the user
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        Returns:
        the market data required by the calculations plus details of any data that could not be built

      • buildCalculationMarketData

        public CalculationMarketDataMap buildCalculationMarketData(CalculationRequirements requirements,
                                                           MarketEnvironment suppliedData,
                                                           MarketDataConfig marketDataConfig,
                                                           ScenarioDefinition scenarioDefinition)
        Description copied from interface: MarketDataFactory
        Builds the market data required for performing calculations over a portfolio for a set of scenarios.

        If the calculations require any data not provided in the suppliedData it is built by the engine before applying the scenario definition.

        CalculationMarketDataMap contains the same data as MarketEnvironment plus additional derived values used by the calculations and scenario framework.

        If the scenario definition contains perturbations that apply to the inputs used to build market data, the data must be built by this method, not provided in suppliedData.

        For example, if a perturbation is defined that shocks the par rates used to build a curve, the curve must not be provided in suppliedData. The engine will only build the curve using the par rates if it is not found in suppliedData.

        Specified by:
        buildCalculationMarketData in interface MarketDataFactory
        Parameters:
        requirements - the market data required for the calculations
        suppliedData - the base market data used to derive the data for each scenario
        marketDataConfig - configuration needed to build non-observable market data, for example curves or surfaces
        scenarioDefinition - defines how the market data for each scenario is derived from the base data
        Returns:
        the market data required by the calculations
